recipesJson.name: Vanilla Cronut
recipesJson.author: mlNikon
recipesJson.description: This is a flaky, buttery cronut with sweet sticky vanilla icing on top filled with a thick vanilla cream. Flv sweet dough strengthens with a steep so let this baby sit for a week or 2...or 6 for a stronger donut flavor.

reviews.text: Early notes to start, as I've only just mixed this. Just felt I had to note immediately that this is insanely good. Luckily I mixed 80ml, so I'm hoping I'll be able to keep it around long enough to see how it steeps over 14 days. Very grateful that you shared this, Em! Thank you.  Update: I made it to day 14 with just a few drops left. FLV Sweet Dough definitely builds with time, like you say. This is masterful mixing.
I steeped for 3 weeks wish i would made a 60ml instead of 30. So i could give it a longer steep. Excellent job and thanks for sharing
My palate may be too numb to pick up on the doughy parts. That said, this is a smooth creamy satisfying vape. Nothing obtrusive, well balanced, and easily vaped all day long.

My goodness this is heavenly! After a long steep it tastes just like that picture, matches the description perfectly. Don't let the low amount of overall flavoring trick you into thinking this might be lightly flavored. It's so rich and buttery I can't ADV it; it would be like eating dessert all day long. But paired with that mid-morning pick-me-back-up coffee or after dinner? Abso-freakin-lutey! Easily one of the best recipes I've tried all year.

Please do yourself a favor and make a large bottle of this so you will have no choice but to let it steep. I've been testing it every three days and it seriously grows exponentially better each time. The combination of WF Croissant and FLV Sweet Dough is absolutely fantastic. If you try it early you'll get much more of the buttery croissant, which is by no means a bad thing. However, if you can manage to hold off, the sweet dough will come forward and create a truly magnificent cronut. The mixture of Vienna Cream and Vanilla Cream Extra makes the perfect filling for this dessert, and the cream is firmly planted in the center of the outstanding bakery profile.

We are not worthy Emily! I have to admit that when I first saw the 7.5% total flavoring I thought it would be more light but for my surprise this is a flavorful, perfectly balanced mix. I love how FLV Sweet Dough is used like a bridge between the croissant and the cream, adding that sweet dark syrup and also making the bakery more rich and full. Thank you for this clever and delicious recipe Em!
